metadata.base_style: cinematic, hyper-detailed photorealism, seamless transitions with explosive energy

sequence.description: A single metallic dumbbell sits in a dark void, spotlighted dramatically. Heavy atmosphere, evoking pure gym energy.

sequence.transition: A frying pan whips in from the left in bullet-time motion, colliding with the dumbbell. The impact triggers a cinematic shockwave: metallic sparks burst outward, then morph into glowing food particles suspended mid-air.

sequence.camera: whip pan tracking → snap zoom → bullet-time orbit
sequence.description: Sparks stretch into glowing shards that transform into raw chicken slices, broccoli florets, eggs, and a protein shaker. They float explosively across the void, then freeze in mid-air like ingredients suspended in zero gravity.

sequence.motion: Freeze-frame on flying ingredients → ultra-slow slicing, cracking, and spinning → then slamming down onto an invisible grid plane, which morphs into a bright kitchen table surface.
sequence.special_effects: light shockwaves from collisions, steam vapor trails, glowing dust as particles reform

sequence.ending: The dark void has now fully transitioned into a clean white kitchen. The dumbbell rolls off-screen while the pan spins down onto the table surface, surrounded by floating food ingredients setting up for Scene 2.

audio.music: Cinematic trap hybrid — deep bass hits layered with percussive impacts, synced with collision and food bursts
audio.sound_effects: metallic clang, particle whoosh, food slicing echoes, vapor hiss
audio.mix_level: punchy mix, hard stereo impacts timed with visual shockwaves
